HTMLMediaElementCaptureStream.summary:
The captureStream() method of the
interface returns a object
which is streaming a real-time capture of the content being rendered in the media
element.

remarks.para: This can be used, for example, as a source for a WebRTC .

-Recording a media element
-MediaStream Recording API
-
-
-WebRTC API

HTMLMediaElementCaptureStream.returns:
A object which can be used as a source for audio and/or
video data by other media processing code, or as a source for WebRTC.
